original_text: Then Daniel said to the steward whom the chief of the eunuchs had assigned over Daniel, Hananiah, Mishael, and Azariah,
korean_text: 환관장이 다니엘과 하나냐와 미사엘과 아사랴를 감독하게 한 자에게 다니엘이 말하되

sentences.original_text: Then Daniel said to the steward
whom the chief of the eunuchs had assigned
over Daniel, Hananiah, Mishael, and Azariah
